name: Falling Rocks 2: Oloroso Edition _ Chris Perez
name_original: Falling Rocks 2: Oloroso Edition _ Chris Perez
description:
Right Arrow = Move Right

Left Arrow = Move Left

Up Arrow = Move Up

Down Arrow = Move Down

Green Blocks = 25 points

Orange Blocks = 5 points

White Blocks = Falling Rocks

Reach 500 points to win!

Lose 3 lives to lose!
